entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
